chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:

My package was supposed to arrive by Tuesday, May 29th. Now it's Friday, May 31st, and the package hasn't arrived yet. The tracking says there haven't been any updates since Tuesday. I'd like to know where my package is because I'm flying off on Sunday for a vacation.

Best regards,
Fabio Schäfer

Thank you very much for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Fabio - Back Market

Hi ecomobile,

The customer has already sent us the necessary documents, please open an investigation and reimburse the customer within the next 24 hours.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Hi ecomobile,

If you don't make the refund within 24 hours, we'll do it ourselves.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have forwarded the relevant documents to our logistics partner and we are currently investigating the whereabouts of the parcel. In the meantime, would the customer prefer a refund or a reshipment?

Regards,
RK

Hi ecomobile,

We will refund the customer.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care
